      • write

        protected final void write(java.lang.String msg,
                           boolean isFinalChunk)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           AWSException
        Invoke this method to send data as WebSocket Continuation Frames.
        Parameters:
        msg - - Application data to be sent over websocket. Will send data as TextFrames
        isFinalChunk - - false, while sending 1st to (n-1) chunks. true, for nth chunk, i.e., if it is the last chunk.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        AWSException

      • write

        protected final void write(byte[] data,
                           boolean isFinalChunk)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           AWSException
        Invoke this method to send data as WebSocket Continuation Frames. i.e., send data in chunks
        Parameters:
        data - - Application data to be sent over websocket. Will send data as BinaryFrames
        isFinalChunk - - false, while sending 1st to (n-1) chunk. true, for nth chunk, i.e., if it is the last chunk.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        AWSException
